ComicInfo.Summary:
The final interview for the Ghostbusters biography is with EGON SPENGLER, who is inspecting the damaged firehouse while they talk. The secret history of the Ghostbusters first run in business concludes here!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Dan Schoening (a) & Luis Antonio Delgado (c) | 1-2 | B | Cover B | Dan Schoening (a) & Luis Antonio Delgado (c) | 3 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Tim Lattie | 4 |

ComicInfo.Characters: Slimer,Janine Melnitz,Egon Spengler,Ray Stantz,Winston Zeddemore,Peter Venkman,Rebecca Morales
